name: Ext_R3_ExpansionProfile_limitedExpansion
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ExpansionProfile.limitedExpansion for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ExpansionProfile.limitedExpansion from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ExpansionProfile|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Controls behaviour of the value set expand operation when value sets are too large to be completely expanded
element.definition: If the value set being expanded is incomplete (because it is too big to expand), return a limited expansion (a subset) with an indicator that expansion is incomplete, using the extension [http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/valueset-toocostly](https://hl7.org/fhir/extension-valueset-toocostly.html).
element.comment: `ExpansionProfile.limitedExpansion` has no related element in R4:Parameters

element.short: Controls behaviour of the value set expand operation when value sets are too large to be completely expanded
